Replying to @moo9000 2019-12-26 14:35
@moo9000 That depends on what you use to generate your site. I use @eleven_ty on a site which gets data from an external source and builds around 900 pages. The build takes less than 6s and entire deploy is ~30s. The comments site deploys when I moderate a batch of comments via slack.
